Description.Text: Situated in a beautiful building of the early twentieth century, framed by a beautiful garden, Hotel Bagliori is a modern 3-star hotel perfect for both leisure and business trips. It is situated in the heart of Milan, the centre of culture, fashion and design, in a highly prestigious position: it is just a short distance away from Corso Buenos Aires, main shopping road and Milan�s Gothic Duomo - the symbol of the city and one of the oldest, largest and most important cathedrals in the world, is also within easy walking distance. Milano Centrale train/metro station is also only a short walk from the hotel, providing access to other city destinations including Milan Linate airport, which is itself only 7 Km drive away . Featuring a charming garden which transforms into a natural sitting room in the summer, this hotel acts as a home-away-from-home where guests can relax and unwind, yet still is close to the action of Milan. A range of modern facilities are available for the guests to enjoy, including 24 h reception and breakfast room. The cosy bar next to the lobby offers calm and comfortable atmosphere and is perfect for a morning coffee, a refreshing drink, a light lunch, or even as a place to relax with a book. The rooms at this hotel are both elegant and functional. They are equipped with modern amenities, including air conditioning, television and high speed internet, to ensure guests have an enjoyable and pleasant stay. For those who seek comfort and superb service, this hotel is an ideal base from which to explore Milan�s unique heritage.
